abstract: An ad campaign by the Newspaper Association of America, "Smart is the new sexy," will extol the virtues of newspapers as something that makes people more informed.
snippet: An ad campaign by the Newspaper Association of America, "Smart is the new sexy," will extol the virtues of newspapers as something that makes people more informed.

headline.main: Group Says Newspapers Aren't Dead, They're Alluring
headline.print_headline: Group Says Newspapers Aren’t Dead, They’re Alluring
